text: musavutaiya antavanai nan parkka ventum. Avar poy colkirar enre niccayamaka nan ennukiren'' enru kurinan. Ivvare hpir'avnukku, avanutaiya tiya kariyankal alakakak kanpikkappattu, nerana valiyiliruntum avan tatukkappattu vittan. Hpir'avnutaiya culcci ellam (vin) alivile tavira (veronrilum) irukkavillai
